snippet: A freeze on capital punishment in Ohio will continue through Jan. 15 after a federal judge extended a moratorium set to expire this week.
abstract: Federal Judge Gregory L Frost extends Ohio's moratorium on the death penalty into Jan 2015 as questions mount about effectiveness of drugs used during executions.
lead_paragraph: A freeze on capital punishment in Ohio will continue through Jan. 15 after a federal judge extended a moratorium set to expire this week.

headline.main: Ohio: Moratorium on Capital Punishment Is Extended
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Moratorium on Capital Punishment Is Extended
